text: kya tumane ye samajh liya hai ki tum (yoon hee) chhod die jaoge aur abhee tak to khuda ne un logon ko mumataaz kiya hee nahin jo tum mein ke (raahe khuda mein) jihaad karate hain aur khuda aur usake rasool aur momeneen ke siva kisee ko apana raazadaar dost nahin banaate aur jo kuchh bhee tum karate ho khuda usase baakhabar hai
